<noinclude>{{structure info}}</noinclude>
Loot altars are sometimes found in [[strongholds]], up to 4 per stronghold can generate.

The entrance to the room generates one of the doors at random, while the other is always a plain 3×3 opening.

They are composed of [[stone bricks]], [[stone brick slabs]] and a [[chest]].
